ARABIC: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلرُّسُلُ كُلُوا۟ مِنَ ٱلطَّيِّبَٰتِ وَٱعْمَلُوا۟ صَٰلِحًا إِنِّى بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ عَلِيمٌ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Messengers, eat of the good things and act rightly. I most certainly know what you do.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: O you apostles, eat things that are clean, and do things that are good. We are surely cognisant of what you do.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Messengers! Partake of the things that are clean, and act righteously. I know well all that you do.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: I told them, "Messengers, eat from the pure things and act righteously; I know all that you do.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “O Noble Messengers, eat good clean things, and do good deeds; I know all that you do.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: O Messengers! Eat of the Tayyibat and do righteous deeds. Verily, I am Well-Acquainted with what you do.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: O apostles! eat of the good things and do good; surely I know what you do.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: O Messengers, eat of the good things and do righteousness; surely I know the things you do.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: O ye messengers! Eat of the good things, and do right. Lo! I am Aware of what ye do.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Messengers, eat what is wholesome and do good deeds: I am well aware of what you do.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: O Ye apostles! eat the good things and work righteously; verily of that which ye work I am the Knower.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: O apostles! Eat of the good things and act righteously. Indeed I know best what you do.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: O ye messengers! enjoy (all) things good and pure, and work righteousness: for I am well-acquainted with (all) that ye do.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: O (you) Messengers! Eat of the Taiyibat [all kinds of Halal (legal) foods which Allah has made legal (meat of slaughtered eatable animals, milk products, fats, vegetables, fruits, etc.], and do righteous deeds. Verily! I am Well-Acquainted with what you do.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Messengers! Eat of that which is good and do good deeds; I have knowledge of the things you do.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: O messengers, eat of the good things, and act with integrity. I am aware of what you do.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [Allah said], "O messengers, eat from the good foods and work righteousness. Indeed, I, of what you do, am Knowing.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [23:51] ‘O messengers, eat of the good things, the lawful things, and perform righteous acts, such as obligatory and supererogatory [rituals]. Surely I know what you do, and will requite you for it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: 378 (0 ye messengers!) the reference here is to Muhammad (Eat of the good thing) eat of the lawful things, (and do right) do righteous works between yourself and your Lord. (Lo! I am Aware) I am aware of the reward (of what ye do) of what you do, Muhammad, and also of what they do.
